title: EnumField: multivalued sort and range queries don't work
description:
In adding a non-Trie-based EnumField alternative in SOLR-11023, multi-valued sort and range tests fail for EnumField in EnumFieldTest.

Since EnumField will be deprecated in 7.0 (in favor of the SOLR-11023 alternative) and removed in 8.0, I don't plan on blocking the 7.0 release for these problems.
